title: User Research & Analysis
description: Conduct comprehensive user research including surveys, interviews, and usability testing to understand current pain points and user needs.

title: Wireframe Creation
description: Create detailed wireframes for all main pages including homepage, product listings, product details, checkout flow, and user account pages.

title: Frontend Development Setup
description: Set up the development environment, configure build tools, establish coding standards, and create the basic project structure with component library.

title: iOS App Architecture Planning
description: Design the overall architecture for the iOS application including navigation flow, data management, and integration points with the backend API.

title: Authentication Module
description: Implement user authentication system with social login options, biometric authentication, and secure token management for both iOS and Android platforms.

title: Content Calendar Planning
description: Develop a comprehensive content calendar for Q2 including blog posts, social media content, email campaigns, and promotional materials aligned with campaign goals.

title: Social Media Strategy
description: Create detailed social media strategy including platform-specific content plans, posting schedules, influencer partnerships, and engagement tactics.

title: API Documentation Review
description: Review and analyze documentation for all third-party APIs to be integrated, including rate limits, authentication methods, and data formats.

title: Payment Gateway Integration
description: Implement secure payment processing with multiple payment gateways including Stripe, PayPal, and Apple Pay with proper error handling and transaction logging.

title: Support Ticket System Design
description: Design the user interface and workflow for the support ticket system including ticket creation, status tracking, priority levels, and automated responses.
